incident_updates.body:
While investigating we discovered that in some instances a different business name was appearing on customer statements.  This issue was flagged and a fix was put into place by our upstream processor.

Depending on the card issuer, some cardholders may see a generic descriptor like "Bambora Internet Wholesale" or “Bambora Internet PSP”.

We continue to work with our upstream processor to reduce the occurrences of this issue.

We have identified an issue with our upstream processor where the DBA (Doing Business As) name is not properly appearing on transactions on some accounts.

As a result, the business name may not appear correctly on some cardholder statements.

We will provide updates once the solution has been confirmed.

components.name: First Data
components.description: Credit card processing for First Data merchants

incident_updates.body: We will be undergoing scheduled maintenance during this time.

affected_components.name: Batch and Bank to Bank Payments

incident_updates.body:
Dear Worldline Customer,

Due to extended datacenter maintenance work of our provider, we will be conducting an emergency maintenance window as a preventive measure. This maintenance is essential to ensure the continued reliability and security of our systems.

These activities will take place July 26th between 9:00 PM to 3:00 AM PT. During this time, there may be a total of 15 minutes intermittent processing downtime.

Maintenance Window Details:
Date: 7/26/2024
Start Time: 9:00 PM PT
End Time: 3:00 AM PT
Impact: Up to 15 minutes of intermittent processing downtime.

We apologize for any inconvenience this may cause and assure you that we will work diligently to minimize any potential impact. If you have urgent questions or concerns, please reach out to our Customer Support team via email support.na@worldline.com or by calling 1-833-226-2672.

We would like to inform you we have scheduled a maintenance window to focus on improving the performance, stability and security of our solution. We apologize for any inconvenience and appreciate your patience. If you have urgent questions or concerns, please reach out to our Customer Support team via email support.na@worldline.com or by calling 1-833-226-2672.
